title: Its Official, Riot Defend Their Sexism - Do Not Stand By It
body: An official [tweet](https://twitter.com/riotgames/status/1036057521675329538) from Riot's twitter has confirmed that they stand by their sexist endeavors. It seems were not going to be getting any sort of intellectual response from them. I would suggest everyone simply stop playing to resist their nonsense, but I doubt most people don't even know what's going on, or that people are too addicted and that they can't stop. But we must show them that this toxic nonsense does not solve any problems.
